fields.title: Jozi Bunny Roll
fields.description: Durban bunny chow reimagined as a soft roll stuffed with curried chicken and sambal.

fields.title: Cape Town Fish Roll
fields.description: Fresh hake in a crusty roll with tartar, lettuce, and a squeeze of lemon.

fields.title: Mzansi Steak Sarmie
fields.description: Grilled sirloin with chimichurri mayo and crispy onions.

fields.title: Zulu Pulled Beef Bun
fields.description: Slow-cooked beef with smoky barbecue and pap-chilli relish.

fields.title: Boerie Baguette
fields.description: Boerewors sausage tucked into a crusty baguette with tomato-and-onion relish.

fields.title: Braaibroodjie Deluxe
fields.description: Toasted sandwich with cheddar, tomato, onion, and a touch of peri-peri.

fields.title: Durban Roti Wrap
fields.description: Tender lamb curry wrapped in flaky roti with fresh coriander.

fields.title: Chicken Gatsby
fields.description: Half-size gatsby with spiced chicken, slap chips, and tangy atchar mayo.

fields.title: Chakalaka Cheeseburger
fields.description: Beef patty, melted cheddar, and spicy chakalaka sauce.

fields.title: Peri-Peri Chicken Roll
fields.description: Flame-grilled chicken in a soft roll with creamy peri-peri sauce.

fields.title: Soweto Shawarma
fields.description: Beef strips, garlic sauce, and pickles rolled in flatbread.

fields.title: Vegan Bunny Pita
fields.description: Curried chickpeas and roasted veg in warm pita bread.

fields.title: Cape Malay Fish Wrap
fields.description: Spiced linefish, slaw, and coconut chutney in a tortilla wrap.

fields.title: Street Flava Club
fields.description: Triple-decker with chicken, bacon, lettuce, tomato, and atchar mayo.

fields.title: Lamb Kofta Roll
fields.description: Spiced lamb patties with tzatziki and fresh salad in a soft roll.

fields.title: Bo-Kaap Falafel Wrap
fields.description: Crispy falafels, pickled onions, and chilli tahini sauce.

fields.title: Chip Roll with a Twist
fields.description: Golden slap chips, peri mayo, and crumbed halloumi.

fields.title: Sweet & Sticky Rib Bun
fields.description: BBQ pork ribs shredded into a glazed, messy delight.

fields.title: Tandoori Street Wrap

fields.title: Mielie Meal Quesadilla
fields.description: Cheese, grilled veg, and spiced chicken in a pap tortilla.

fields.title: Biltong BLT
fields.description: Bacon, lettuce, tomato, and shaved biltong for extra crunch.

fields.title: Grilled Veg Panini
fields.description: Zucchini, peppers, mushrooms, and basil pesto.

fields.title: Moroccan Spiced Lamb Flatbread

fields.title: Peri Veggie Burger
fields.description: Grilled veggie patty, peri-peri sauce, and cheese.

fields.title: Snoek & Atchar Roll
fields.description: Flaked smoked snoek with spicy mango atchar.

fields.title: Shisanyama Sub
